channel.title: pipeline on Zachary Loeber
channel.description: Recent content in pipeline on Zachary Loeber

item.title: Some Cool Kubernetes Tools
item.description: Are you working with kubernetes regularly? There are so many tools out there it can be difficult to know which ones to use. Here are a few of them I’ve found to be useful but may have flown under your radar.

item.title: ADO - Updating Variable Groups
item.description: Azure DevOps Libraries are groups of variables which can be exceedingly useful in your pipelines. I’ll cover how one can automate their update and creation via terraform and some simple bash scripting.

item.title: The Raw Helm Chart
item.description:
DevOps: The Raw Helm Chart

The raw helm chart is designed to glue raw kubernetes configuration elements into the application deployment stack. This can be one way to put lifecycle around your cluster configuration and its super handy to have in your toolbelt.

item.title: Hugo - A DevOps Approach
item.description: I’ve updated my site to use hugo some time ago. Recently I’ve found some time to add a deployment pipeline for this site as well. This short article will cover how the pipeline code works and dive into multi-stage pipelines.
